translations: v．（使）醒来，（使）觉醒：从睡眠中恢复清醒，或使某人从睡眠中恢复清醒。

sentences.sentence: My father wakens early every morning.
sentences.translation: 我父亲每天早上醒得很早。

sentences.sentence: Thee firefly wakens: waken thou with me.
sentences.translation: 萤火虫醒来：唤醒了你和我。 。

sentences.sentence: And that mercy of God wakens us to life!
sentences.translation: 上帝的怜悯唤醒我们的生命！
